snippet: The uprising in Libya last year, especially the decades-old weapons let loose in the chaos, tell a cold-war tale of allies and arms deals.
abstract: The uprising in Libya last year, especially the decades-old weapons let loose in the chaos, tell a cold-war tale of allies and arms deals.

byline.original: By C. J. CHIVERS and JOHN ISMAY

headline.main: American White Phosphorus Shells in Libya: A Challenge to a Pentagon Chestnut
